Name: Heritage Museum Carousel
Location: Heritage Museums and Gardens, Sandwich, Massachusetts
Notes: original location Crescent Park,Riverside, Rhode Island, moved to Fall River, Massachusetts, then to Provincetown, Massachusetts, then to present location in 1969

Name: Grand Carousel
Notes: moved to present location in 1941 from Riverview Park in Rahway, New Jersey; Looff frame, Carmel horses; operational brass rings

Name: Santa Monica Pier Carousel
Notes: replaced in 1947 with PTC #62; Looff Hippodrome carousel building is a National Historic Landmark

Name: Van Andel Museum Carousel
Notes: original location Lakewood Park, Barnesville, Pennsylvania, moved to present location in 1982
